title: Community Wellness
description: Promoting physical and mental health through fitness programs, counseling services, and wellness workshops.

blocks.title: Community Wellness Program
blocks.subtitle: Nurturing mind, body, and spirit for a healthier community

blocks.heading: Holistic Health for Everyone
blocks.content:
Our Community Wellness program takes a holistic approach to health, offering resources and activities that address physical fitness, mental health, nutrition, and social connection.

All activities are free or low-cost, making wellness accessible to everyone in our community.

cards.title: Fitness Classes
cards.description: Yoga, Zumba, walking groups, and strength training for all fitness levels.

cards.title: Mental Health
cards.description: Support groups, counseling referrals, and stress management workshops.

cards.title: Nutrition
cards.description: Healthy cooking classes, nutrition education, and community meals.

cards.title: Health Screenings
cards.description: Free blood pressure checks, health fairs, and preventive care resources.

blocks.heading: Weekly Schedule
blocks.content:
Monday: Morning Yoga (9 AM) | Walking Group (5 PM)

Tuesday: Stress Management Support Group (6 PM)

Wednesday: Zumba (6 PM) | Healthy Cooking Class (7 PM)

Thursday: Strength Training (9 AM) | Meditation Circle (7 PM)

Saturday: Community Wellness Fair (Monthly, 9 AM - 2 PM)
